scripts.pantograph.build: cd packages/pantograph && npm run build && cp -f dist/standalone/index.html ../../public/pantograph.html && cp -f dist/standalone/pantograph.js ../../public/pantograph.js && cp -f dist/standalone/pantograph.css ../../public/pantograph.css
scripts.demonaco.build: pnpm run demonaco.backend.build && pnpm run demonaco.parser.build
scripts.packages.build: pnpm run pantograph.build && pnpm run demonaco.build
scripts.build: pnpm run packages.build && vite build && rm -rf docs && cp -rf dist docs && git add -A && git commit -m'rebuild' && git push
scripts.clean: rm -rf dist/ docs/ public/Lib public/Tutorial public/pantograph*
